mention.text: either developers of natural language -LRB- NL -RRB- interfaces or researchers in speech understanding -LRB- SU -RRB-
the DARPA Spoken Language Systems -LRB- SLS -RRB-

the only NL evaluations other than the series of Message Understanding Conferences -LRB- Sundheim , 1989 ; Sundheim , 1991 -RRB- to have been developed and used by a group of researchers at different sites , although several excellent workshops have been held to study some of these problems -LRB- Palmer et al. , 1989 ; Neal et al. , 1991 -RRB-
a practical `` black-box '' methodology for automatic evaluation of question-answering NL systems
